reviewText: This special collaboration among four masters of smooth jazz performing live in a recording studio is a true delight ,in terms of their musicianship.The tracklist includes a mixed bag of songs,most of which are favourites:101 Eastbound,Chant,After the Dance,Bali Run,Between the Sheets and Amoroso.  What is lacking is the absence of any stage design whatsoever which could improve the overall performance and the Dolby Digital 2.0 soundtrack,which could be more impressive had it been remastered in Dolby Digital 5.1 .Nevertheless if you are into smooth jazz,play this and you are in for a pleasant evening.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I'm not a big fan of the smooth jazz genre because I feel that the music is too repetative, but I do own this DVD and it is quite good. I enjoyed the performances by all the members in the band and they all showed their own reconized talent.
Title: N/A

reviewText: a few nice surprises on this dvd with guest appearances of chaka khan, Phil Perry and Philip Bailey.  Top musicians having fun together
summary: Not a recent recording but some nice work
Title: N/A

reviewText: this is one great jazz performance by the four play jazz band.  i got tired of bob james performing solo and his same routine of jazz music.  but this time, he is superb with the other jazz legends performing in this special dvd live presentation. bob james reinvented himself here with the help of the other guys who were extremely fabulous.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Watching them play music you have been listening to for all these years ...........  great.  Just like being there.  I enjoyed all of the album.  Amazon has always been my favorite place to buy from.  They know what they are doing and I am always confident I will get a good product.
Title: N/A
